title: My Favourite wife
creator_credit: RKO Radio Pictures, Leo McCarey and Garson Kanin
brief_description: Eight years after his wife’s disappearance in a shipwreck, Nick Arden remarries. However Ellen is not dead and reappears in time to join Nick and his new wife Bianca on their honeymoon. Nick lacks the courage to tell Bianca the truth and the situation becomes more complicated when he discovers that Ellen was not alone on her “desert island.” Starring Irene Dunne, Cary Grant, Randolph Scott and Gail Patrick. This comedy will delight lovers of the suave Cary Grant.
